items.name: Replication Data for: JGR-Atmosphere: The Evolution and Causes of Damaging Surface Winds in the 30 April 2021 Derecho-Producing Mesoscale Convective System in East China
items.description: The processed datasets in the article, including the surface automatic station and radar observations, and ERA5 reanalysis datasets at 0.25-degree resolution for the mesoscale convective system over the east China during 29-30 April 2021. High-resolution WRF simulation outputs analyzed in this article are included. Datasets generated for the trajectory calculation and horizontal momentum budget analysis are also included.
items.citationHtml: Luo, Liping, 2022, "Replication Data for: JGR-Atmosphere: The Evolution and Causes of Damaging Surface Winds in the 30 April 2021 Derecho-Producing Mesoscale Convective System in East China", https://doi.org/10.7910/DVN/RP9EC6, Harvard Dataverse, V2
